lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: It's time we look after each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Boise State University (Go Broncos!), working toward a Master of Engineering in Computer Engineering. I work on a team designing printers.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in my life to have traveled to many places in this world. When traveling, I love meeting the local people, eating new foods, and learning about different cultures. I have seen first hand and know the great impact that small business people can have for thier families and in thier community. These loans are so great and can do so much good. It makes me feel good to help people develop these businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: My background is in agriculture, I like pig and grain farming. I currently help scientists and doctors develop new human drugs.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: people will understand the gospel of Christ through the love and generosity of people who know him.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor.  I show young people the love of Christ, and try to love others with them.

lenders.name: michelle and corey
lenders.occupation: Stay at home Mom and computer consultant
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world, because all of us share the same planet.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I was married, had 2 children, and was divorced with no job skills at the age of 25.  With a lot of hard work and help from family I was able to have a great career and retire at 55.  Donating to Kiva is a way to give back to others who are owning their destiny and working hard to support themselves & their family.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because:
My life is so blessed that I want to share those blessings with others in need.
"Be the change you want to see in the world." Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 2nd grade teacher in a classroom of 20 boys and girls.  My students are between 7-8 years old.  I teach them reading, math, science, social studies, character education and many social skills. I love what I do!

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I can and should. What a great organization!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, on a stage (performer) and around my house. It's all good.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone trying hard to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward...

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: Like being able to know about who receives the loans

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to do something for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor who takes care of adults in a medical clinic.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Life is about giving!  May each of us extend our blessings to those in need!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity is a gift.  The spirit of the Kiva organization is inspiring and I am excited for the opportunity to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of an amazing nine year old girl.  My career began as an elementary school teacher, but now I work in the wild world of startups at TechCrunch.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to achieve greatness

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: God.
lenders.occupational_info: that would be difficult.  Everyone does not own a computer!

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have enormous admiration for people all over the world who work so hard to improve their lives and the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the finances for a number of US Television productions seen around the country.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and they have so little - not just.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Dan and Tina
lenders.loan_because: We would like to provide opportunity for people around the world to do what they love and improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Dan manufactures chemicals that are used to make medicines and other products. Tina manages the household and takes care of their 2 children.

lenders.name: Brian and Jemma
lenders.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because I believe it is the best way to get the most money directly to the people that can most benefit from it. I make loans because I realize I am extremely lucky to have been born into the place and time that I was. But for an accident of fate, I would be needing the assistance I can easily give now.
lenders.occupational_info: I do emergency mental health evaluations. I meet with people who are experiencing a personal crisis and I try to help determine that person can saty safe and get the help they need.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am a business owner myself.  I have everything I need.  Opportunity is a gift, and giving to fulfill a dream makes me happy!  Everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: We prepare land for buildings and homes.  I work in the office and do accounting and billing for the business.

lenders.name: Karan
lenders.loan_because: A great way for one person to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I taught elementary school in a rural area for 30 years. Now retired.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I really like that the funds are going directly to those in need of a hand up not a hand out.  I respect and admire these entrepreneurs for their hard work and determination to provide a good life for their families.

lenders.name: cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it makes me happy knowing I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet ventures

lenders.name: angelina
lenders.loan_because: As a struggeling musician for 15 years, I have drained all my finances just to obtain little items that make a big difference. For example, guitar, keyboard, sound equipment, etc.  To date the only item I have been able to obtain on my own was my Ovation Guitar and it took me 5 months to pay for it.  I am a single 31 yr old woman, high school graduate and currently trying to obtain a grant to go to the University of Phoenix, online course.  Coming from a poor family has had it's hardships but I have learned to work for what I want.  I needed a website badly (all musicians do) but since I could not afford to pay hundreds and hundreds of dollars to get one, I learned the software myself and built the website on my own.  It would so nice, and I would be forever grateful if there was some kind of help available.  With the right funds I can record in the studio, make a demo, send it out to the right people, pay for my songwriting which is a huge expense, and continue in my path of making my dreams a reality.  I have a lazy eye which has debilitated me.  I was working as a legal secretary until 4 years ago.  Then I started the web design on the side,...however my left eye is now legally blind and it is effecting my ability to work on a computer at a desk.  I have to minimize that time as much as possible or I spend my days dizzy and sick.  Not many jobs in this town and my income is less than $400.00 a month.  I am forever grateful to those who can help.  Thank you so very much!
lenders.occupational_info: Singer, songwriter, musician and passionate lover of music....seeks funds to continue dream....  disability enables the ability to work to support career.  Anyone that can help, I am forever grateful.

lenders.name: Francisca
lenders.loan_because: we need to empower women all over the globe!
lenders.occupational_info:
i work in the Environmental Health Coalition.
forming a youth group in our community to fight environmental racism

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I thoroughly respect and admire the people Kiva lends to.  Even though, in many cases, they have limited means and are often living in unstable regions, the vast majority of them repay their obligations.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and I want to give back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I hire technology and engineering consultants to work on projects across the United States.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: You get to share a little part of someone's dream

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: If I have food on my table and a roof over my head, then I can give a little of what I have to help somebody else achive the same.

lenders.name: dean and julie
lenders.loan_because: We have been so blessed with a beautiful, healthy family.  We LOVE this organization!!

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required.

lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company's philanthropic activities and help employees volunteer for non-profit organizations.

lenders.occupational_info: I retired early from my career in Human Resources.

lenders.name: Rissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to.  I loan because I should.  I loan because I can.  I loan because it makes me feel good.  And, honestly, who doesn't like to feel good?

lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds to build a Metropolitan Park here in California.

lenders.occupational_info: I help my company find the right people to do the job.  I also help people find the right job.

lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software that is used for creating video games.

lenders.occupational_info: I run a birth center were woman can have a happy, healty and safe birth.

lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we know perfectly how hard can be sometimes to raise money for the ideas you believe in. We want to help others in this subject as much as we want others to believe in us.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a young micro-ISV doing web-apps for a few years.

lenders.name: Katie

lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm a full time student studying the social sciences so I can teach high school.  I work part time in a restaurant as a server.

lenders.loan_because: We care about building a global community!!!!

lenders.name: Vino and Canvas
lenders.loan_because: We want to do what we can to help!  As a growing small business we understand the time, effort, and hardwork needed to succeed!  We enjoy knowing we are helping someone achieve their goals and dreams.  Kiva has created something amazing and we am thankful we can be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: Vino & Canvas is a mobile business offering painting parties at a variety of local establishments around the Phoenix Valley. We\'ll also bring the party to your home or office. Partygoers create their own masterpiece in an entertaining atmosphere with the assistance of a talented art instructor. All supplies are included! Grab your friends and join us for enjoyable evening you’ll never forget! Get your artistic buzz on!

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because it's a mitzvah - responsibility - in Judaism.  I love humanity.  

"For I desire kindness, not sacrifice." (Hos. 6:6)
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Hebrew and Judaism to children in Jewish day schools.

lenders.loan_because: I believe that what comes around goes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in need with e.g. legal advices and court proceedings.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: ...too often, we wait for tomorrow to lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help plan and coordinate inspection and maintenance services on our electricity-producing customers' gas turbines and generators.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who show a desire to work hard to improve their economic position.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to operate heavy equipment in order to obtain employment in the construction industry.

lenders.name: JLH
lenders.loan_because: I can.  This is what IT's all about, doing what we can to help others.  I have so many blessings; why not share with the world?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a group of doctors.  I work to make sure that the health insurance companies pay our patients'  medical bills.

lenders.name: Annamarie
lenders.loan_because: Loaning just a little makes a big difference.  Together we can change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large university as an assistant to a dean.  Mainly, I schedule meetings for her and make sure she has everything she needs to make decisions.  Next year, I hope to start a PhD program in counseling psychology.

lenders.name: jason, cheri, & zev
lenders.loan_because: Kiva made it possible!

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I believe that there should be a sharing of resources amongst the whole of earth's inhabitants.  God has given me more than others not so I can horde it all to myself, but rather to give of my surplus that others may benefit.  Lending is an exciting way to let others become more involved in the commerce in their neighborhood.
lenders.occupational_info: Money flows in and out through businesses and also to a much smaller degree families and individuals.  Businesses need a person to keep track of the money that comes and goes in the business on a daily, weekly, monthly and annual basis.  The business owners benefit from reports that I prepare that show them how their business in doing - sort of like a doctor listening to the heart of a patient to get an understanding of what is going on inside the body.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 911 dispatcher and have to deal with stressful situations on a daily basis and in most cases people that I deal with aren't happy and usually not very nice.

lenders.name: Elizabeth n Jennie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the KIVA system is the most promising way to make a difference in people's lives on a larger scale.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my daughter who is ill and substitute teach on occasion

lenders.loan_because: To help people trying to make an honest living. People trying to provide for themselves, their family, and to better their communities.

lenders.name: thomas

lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs to use storytelling to create and communicate an engaging business strategy.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired government worker.  I enjoy crocheting, knitting, baking PIZZELLE cookies, gardening, bird watching and linedancing.

lenders.occupational_info: I used to work for a car dealership until I got married.  Now I have the privledge of not having to work and to just take care of my home, family, and animals.

lenders.name: Zach

I told him he could buy a toy if he wanted with his money (praying he wouldn't smile and say "OK!")... and, of course he said "No way Mom, I want to help!).
lenders.occupational_info: Kindergarten is hard work.  We are learning how to read, but man this English language is really confusing!

lenders.name: Haii
lenders.loan_because:
Alohai'i!

Many wonderful things like these just don't happen;  You and I can make them happen now !!! Please consider kiva.org.

lenders.occupational_info:
I run the retail division of a CHOCOLATE company!
The company I work for was founded by a woman and we support women's organizations and many green mission causes.
The mantra of our company is "travel the world through chocolate," so our owner and chocolatier creates chocolates that use ingredients from all over the world.  I felt like joining Kiva was  a great opportunity to exercise the values of my company while giving me an amazing opportunity to personally give back!

Someone, somewhere is praying for help.....We are Blessed to help.

Philippians 4:6 Be anxious for nothing, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God

lenders.occupational_info: I run an online business and am currently undertaking a degree in Asian Languages and Asian Politics & Culture.

lenders.name: Lainie
lenders.occupation: Small business owners - The Sunglass Fix
lenders.loan_because: There are no more excuses to wonder what we as individuals can do to help others in need to improve their lives and support their families. To believe in people and for them to pass that onto their children, to believe in your dreams,  is truly a great gift to give.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I run a business where we manufacture high quality sunglass lenses so people can replace their old, scratched lenses or upgrade their existing lens into their own frames.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because: I believe if you can, you must. Makes me feel great to know I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my husband run a home automation business. We design custom systems for homes to control everything from the TV's and music to energy management.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Its such a small amount to lend to someone and it helps them make improvements to theirs and their families lives....
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a registered nurse working on casual contracts. I enjoy the challenge of new places and caring for diverse populations.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a school for students that have trroble learing to read.  I am a psychological counselor

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Micah 6:8 He has shown all you people what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a chemical engineer for a company that is working on biological solutions for industrial problems.

lenders.name: CMourot
lenders.loan_because: I know that a small group of caring individuals can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children from ages 9-15.

lenders.name: FIU Micro Lenders Corp
lenders.loan_because:
The FIU Micro Lenders, a new student organizing committee at Florida International University, as well as a non-profit 501c3 Florida corporation is committed to helping fight global poverty. Via mutually beneficial partnerships with local businesses, fund-raising efforts, and encouraging microfinance education for FIU's students they seek to provide tools for everyone to make their own contribution to a better world. 

We will continue to forge partnerships within our community, raise awareness of the powerful force of microfinance, and redefine what it means to be an International Business student.

For more information or to join your energies to our fight, please email us at:

fiumicrolenders@gmail.com
Second Kiva page at:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/fiumicrolenders
lenders.occupational_info: We are International Business students enrolled at Florida International University.

lenders.name: Faye
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed during my life and want to share with someone less fortunate than me.  I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: A paralegal works with barristers or lawyers to get justice for those who have been harmed or injured by the wrongful actions of another person or company.

lenders.name: keith
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out. It makes me feel good I mean real good
lenders.occupational_info: I do x-rays at the public hospital (we deal mostly with the poor so their is some free health care here in the good old USA)

lenders.name: Stephannie
lenders.loan_because:
it is empowering as a hand-up.
We find it important to give to others in any way that we can.  We are blessed to have so much more than most.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher, and my son is a student at 16 :)

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: It's that principle, give a man a fish and he eats today; teach a man to fish and he'll feed his whole village.  I want to enable a lot of people to eat fish :)

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people make their own dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two children.  They are six and three years old.  I want to set an example for the kind of person that I want them to be when they grow up.  Being a lender on this web-site is part of that.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy watching the expansion of people's business'. I am grateful they have the opportunity to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: Approve loans for people applying for home loans.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit!
lenders.occupational_info: Colorful

lenders.name: prince
lenders.loan_because: want to start a business like poltry farm. want to help poor people by giving them job.
lenders.occupational_info:
my total plan is in different phases.
my first phase is to start with a poltry farm. which requires a machine which costs 1400 usd. i will finance half of it and reqires loan half of it.
in my secound phase i will start a dairy farm.
in my last phase i want to start a big company of processing powder milk.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: It's a neat way to expand my philanthropy to a more personal level.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by my mother who started her first business as a minority in the US and single mother of 3.   She is now the most successful person I know, in every way.  She taught me to be successful too and now I want to pass whatever blessings I am able to on to as many people I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a yoga studio in downtown los angeles (across the street from world known landmark- The Disney Concert Hall).  I also own a coaching seminar business and television production company with my husband.  Most importantly I am pregnant with twin girls.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I've been without before - I've been blessed with enough and then some now.  It is God's commandment that those to whom much is given, much is expected.

lenders.name: Cathryn
lenders.loan_because: my husband and i are both disabled. we receive benefits from uncle sam and live a frugal life. we are so grateful for what we have and wanted to share. we are very lucky to have what we have and live in a country which takes care of it's disabled people. we want to give back what we can to someone who is working to make thier business succeed to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a home-maker, my husband is an artist.

lenders.name: tom
lenders.loan_because: it gives me joy and purpose to pass on my blessings from God to others who in turn plant their own seeds of love and self-reliance.

lenders.name: Renate
lenders.loan_because: I was just given a wonderful gift and I want to share my good fortune with others

lenders.name: Lisa & Kate
lenders.loan_because: Because we care.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than me and to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Shaun & Dawn
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someone's life and their community.

lenders.name: Chandra
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to be part of other's success.
lenders.occupational_info: Creative at times ..

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I've been given so many opportunities; I want to be able to give the gift of opportunity to others.

lenders.name: Saravanakumar
lenders.loan_because: I want to uplift the life of a person in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God has given me with others.

lenders.name: GlenlawnB
lenders.loan_because: We want to provide a hand up to the developing world; "teach a man to fish to feed himself rather than just giving a fish."
lenders.occupational_info: Students learning how to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micofinancing, regardless of how economically advantageous it is to prosperous countries. I say that because as we've learned so painfully, just because you are a developed country doesn't mean that your banking systems are sound or moral. Just because something "works" one day doesn't mean it will the next (i.e. hedge funds). I just want deserving people to be able to borrow money and make a living, period.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to support and encourage people who wish to move toward self sufficiency.  I admire those who have an entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with organizations and individuals to improve their leadership and management skills through workshops and individual coaching.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way to make a big difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Working in a local church where we are attempting to follow Jesus, change our community and impact the world.

lenders.name: Beverly & Sonny
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to share these blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I do loans for home purchases and my husband is a retired truck driver.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to start your own business.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in some way!

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: While I don't have much, God has blessed me tremendously and I want to share these blessings with those in need who are trying to make a living for their families. Working with my husband in his computer consulting business, I know the difficulties that come with owning and running your own business and trying to make it a success.
lenders.occupational_info: The work I perform in my husband's business includes the majority of the administrative office duties.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I constantly hear or see all the horror, poverty, etc. in the world. I have this overwhelming desire to help, assist in some way, GIVEBACK. I wanted to stop being one of those who talks about it and is doing something about it. Kiva is a phenomenal concept that allows one to do this and I am blessed to have gained knowledge of it so I can do my part.
lenders.occupational_info: Busy, busy, busy :-) Not enough hours in a day. I work in Music Publishing so it is a gift to be around what I love most, music! I am also a Student completing my degree in Sociology, so I hope to go onto Law School in the next few years and go into Criminal or Family Law.

lenders.name: Marg
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I use photography to help people show the world how they want to be seen.

A video about my work in India on my blog:

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend university and study Spanish and Women's studies.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I feel a responsibility to help those who are less fortunate and also to teach my children that it is possible to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Life has given me more than I could have ever asked for and I want to pay it forward to others less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure the successful delivery of emerging technologies and interactive solutions for my Organization.

lenders.name: Beñat
lenders.loan_because: A better world is posible!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm manager in a small newspaper written in basque the language of the basque people.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I understand some of the difficulties involved in manifesting my dreams. I hope that the sale of my works which fund me will also help others fulfill their goals too.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an artist who builds treasure chests.  Each is 
Created with the belief that everyone should have a beautiful, unique and special place to keep the things they treasure...something visible and alive, becoming part of your story. Each is always unique & handmade with an element reminding us that we are all connected and part of something bigger. For example, the treasure boxes are all the same on the inside - just as we are all very different on the outside but consist of the same elements within.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help people who are trying to improve their lives. It can take just a little from us to make a big difference in another human beings life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am blessed to live in a country where I am afforded the opportunity to do whatever I want to do, to have the freedom to have a job and to be able to take care of my family. I hope that my getting involved with Kiva can make someone elses life better.

lenders.name: SP Business Students
lenders.loan_because: As our school moto states:  "Be a living expression of God's kindness."  This encourages us to help others and share equal opportunity for all.  We hope our small contributions will make a difference in a big way.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of business students from Saint Paul High School in Niagara Falls studying international business, entrepreneurship and accounting.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I don't believe in charity. I believe in solidarity. Charity is so vertical. It goes from the top to the bottom. Solidarity is horizontal. It respects the other person and learns from the other. I have a lot to learn from other people. - Eduardo Galeano

lenders.name: Frederic
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is investing in my family, the human race!

lenders.name: The Giraldi Family
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance to start a business.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I have money that i'm more then happy to give to someone else, I know that they need it more then I do so why should I just keep it sitting in a bank.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: there is a need

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: 1 billion  people in the world live on less than $1 per day. We have got to change that!

No one truly wants to have to accept a handout.  This program is about empowerment and I just had to be a part of it.

lenders.loan_because: "You give a man a fish he will eat for a day, you teach a man how to fish [or in this case the ability to fish] he will eat for a lifetime."

lenders.occupational_info: After a wonderful career in family child care, I now spend my days enjoying life with my soulmate husband, spending time with family & especially my grandson, Jake!

lenders.occupational_info: I work at a fertilizer plant contracted out by one of the largest oil company in Canada.  I am in charge of making sure all equiptment is operating correctly and reporting any malfunction to maintenace department, also monitoring the computer system.

lenders.occupation: Student/ Full time mom of Three
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful opportunity!  I am overseas with the Military and saw Oprah on AFN and could not go to bed with out helping someone in need!  I believe my family and I are getting just as much out of this as the person we are helping somewhere in the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time mom and student working towards my Bachlor degree in Education!  I have two more years of college before I become a teacher!

lenders.name: Nayantara
lenders.loan_because: i was taught to share.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a college in Wichita Kansas. I answer phones & enter data in the computer. I do alot of paperwork for accounts receivable.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life that can also affect others.  We are all part of the same world, same race...the human race.  To touch someone else's life helps to give meaning to mine.  May you be blessed everyday will happiness and peace.  You are loved.
lenders.occupational_info: Move to Colorado in June 2013. Working as a call center agent, right now. Just had a stroke in March, and this is my way of reaching out to the world.

lenders.name: Carrie and Ken
lenders.loan_because: $25 is less than we spend at happy hour with friends, so there's really no excuse not to!!

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business that faciliates adoptions in the U.S.  My work is challenging and rewarding at the same time.

lenders.name: Adonica
lenders.loan_because: "We must be the change we wish to see in the world."  Ghandi
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses with import/export and trade regulations

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Lovonna
lenders.loan_because: I want be apart of something that matters.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the Aviation Industry on the behalf of the U.S. government.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: thankfully, I can... and it feels good to help!

lenders.name: My Friend Bob
lenders.loan_because: How exciting that I can invest in a business that can make a difference on the other side of the world.

lenders.name: Tristin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, and this is a way anyone can help for just $25.00

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I want to help.

lenders.name: Eve-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I, myself, have been helped by other people thru my life and it feels good to finally find a way to give some help back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur in real estate.  I also do voluntary work on a streetwise social workers' project to help people suffering of mental health problems. I am also a member of the board on "la Société d'Habitation du Québec", Quebec's para-govermental society taking care of social housing.

lenders.name: Greenly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student.

lenders.name: Angel, Russ, Zoe & KK
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am honored to be a part of this amazing business idea. I truly believe if people will participate in Kiva it will change the world in huge and wonderful ways. Bravo Kiva!!
lenders.occupational_info: My job is amazing! I am on call 24 hours a day and work for hugs and kisses. :0) I am especially excited to loan to other mommas who are working hard to take care of their children. You are an inspiration. Thanks for letting us be a small part of your lives.

lenders.name: Mary & Becky
lenders.loan_because: My parents taught our family the joy of giving from the time we were young children ~ and it's a tradition we have continued.  I hope those who receive will one day be in a position to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I research our family history to uncover our ancestry, stories, legends and information about our past to share with our children and to pass on to future generations.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other have a chance to make a living and make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of medics in the United States Army.  I help take care of the medics and their needs so they can take care of others and save lives.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: blessed are the merciful for they will be shown mercy- Matthw 5:7
lenders.occupational_info: College Student

lenders.name: Jaci
lenders.loan_because: when my husband and I started our mfg company, there were many people who supported us in ways that completely surprised us!  Now its our turn.
lenders.occupational_info: We have an injection molding company - we make plastic stuff.

lenders.name: Bernadette
lenders.loan_because: I should do everything I can for other people
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in development economics and i have been inspired by microfinance programs across the globe.

lenders.name: Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate the computers for my company's business on the Internet.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Yaro & Dave
lenders.loan_because: it is important for all of us to help others

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: A little of something is better than a lot of nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling a service to help companies manage their printers.

lenders.name: Tracy & Mike
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Happy Mommy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Tikkun Olam.

lenders.name: angelica
lenders.loan_because: I see it as a way to empower women around the world to become entrepenuer and help their families .
lenders.occupational_info: I am a health care professional that  assist injured people in get ing well again.

lenders.name: Jeff Wilhite
lenders.loan_because: Christ is Lord.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software for electric companies.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunities we in North America are lucky to have.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I can, so I should- I'd like to think someone would do it for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Network Install and Repair (Routers and Switches)

lenders.name: Reuben
lenders.loan_because: microfinance works!
lenders.occupational_info: Organize people to do stuff.

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: To help people in need achieve their goals

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to help, but didn't know how.  I would donate money, but I always wanted to have more of a relationship and idea where the money was going.

lenders.name: The Nightingale Family
lenders.loan_because: we are blessed and we believe we should.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupation: Geologist- I'm the balding old guy in the photo
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to understand the changing landscapes of the Great Plains during the past 40 million years. I also build stone poems.

lenders.name: Cindy & Chris
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way for people to start the process of getting out of poverty. They feel accomplished by making their own money, and I am more than glad to be part of the process. Loaning is the easy part, these brave people are doing the real work. Micro-financing is an innovative idea in the fight against poverty. We need more ideas like this one.  It just feels good to help someone help themself!
